## StabilioStoreListenerParams interface

Parameters passed to [StabilioStore](./lib-base.stabiliostore.md) listeners.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StabilioStoreListenerParams<T = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

Use the [subscribe()](./lib-base.stabiliostore.subscribe.md) function to register a listener.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [newState](./lib-base.stabiliostorelistenerparams.newstate.md) | [StabilioStoreState](./lib-base.stabiliostorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire previous state. |
|  [oldState](./lib-base.stabiliostorelistenerparams.oldstate.md) | [StabilioStoreState](./lib-base.stabiliostorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire new state. |
